law.history: Repealed 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 113, effective July 15, 1998; amended ch. 69, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1998; and ch. 426, sec. 80, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 225,sec. 2, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 114, sec. 3. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 58, sec. 9, effective March 5, 1952.

metadata.former-codification: KRS 39.408, renumbered by the Reviser of Statues in 1974.
metadata.former-history: Repealed 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 4, effective June 14, 1962. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 58, sec. 8, effective March 5, 1952.
metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/98). Under KRS 446.260, the repeal of this section in 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 226 prevails over its amendment in 1998 Ky. Acts chs. 69 and 426.
